BackstoryDef.title: enslaved child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured as a slave on a raid rather than being born in the dreadfleet.

BackstoryDef.title: vat grown
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was grown in a vat in space. Neural stimulation was used to give them the basic education needed for slavery.

BackstoryDef.title: free range child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was found one day living amongst the slaves on the dreadfleet, the child of unprocessed tribals or slaves who had not been sterilized.

BackstoryDef.title: liche's clone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was cloned in a growth vat from the genetic stock of a prominent liche of the dreadfleet.

BackstoryDef.title: liche's child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a conventional conception and was born and raised as any other upper class spacer under the patronage of their liche parent.

BackstoryDef.title: harem grown
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was grown from conception to adulthood in a vat tuned to produce a perfect concubine.

BackstoryDef.title: raider prodigy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken as a slave off of a rimworld, and quickly distinguished themself as a natural prodigy at the art of violence. Before even reaching adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] was able to afford genetic alteration which propelled them into the higher classes of their society.

BackstoryDef.title: liche's child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a conventional conception and was trained from a young age in the brutal arts of slavery and combat under the supervision of their liche parent.

BackstoryDef.title: harem clone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a clone of a prominent liche, grown from conception to adulthood in a vat tuned to produce a perfect concubine for the original's harem.

BackstoryDef.title: trophy child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is the laboratory created child of a dreadfleet celebrity and the parent who raised them. Amongst children raised in the fleet, they probably experienced the closest thing to a loving home and family life that can be found.
